titleStmt.title: By the King and Queen, a declaration requiring all officers and soldiers to observe strict discipline, and for payment of quarters. William R.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1689-1694 : William and Mary)
Mary II, Queen of England, 1662-1694.
William III, King of England, 1650-1702.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Charles Bill, and the executrix of Thomas Newcomb, deceas'd; printers to the King and Queens most excellent Majesties,

notesStmt.note: At end of text: Given at our court at Whitehall, the third day of December, 1691. In the third year of Our reign.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

person.persName: Charles Bill, and the executrix of Thomas Newcomb, deceas'd;
